name: Angelique Voice Fantasy
overview: Angelique is a young girl from earth, chosen by the Queen to be a prospective candidate to rule Elysion, but only one person is keeping her from her goal, her rival and scoolmate, Rosalia. Angelique must prove her worth by winning over all the officers of the court and showing the people of Elysion how kind she is in this 1996 romantic strategy rpg from Koei.
